tabs.content:
//***********************************************************************************************************
// Here are two articles to help you get started with KQL:
// KQL reference guide - https://aka.ms/KQLguide
// SQL - KQL conversions - https://aka.ms/sqlcheatsheet
//***********************************************************************************************************


// See how many records are in the table.
adsb
| count

// Use "take" to view a sample number of records in the table and check the data.
adsb
| take 10

//Latest ingestion time
adsb
| summarize  max(ingestion_time())


adsb
| where timestamp > todatetime('2025-08-18 16:30:00')
| summarize by timestamp
| order by timestamp desc


//Sample of  aircraft records
adsb
| where name ==  'readsb_aircraft'
| where notempty(fields["r"])
| where notempty(fields["t"])
| take 10

adsb
| where name ==  'readsb_aircraft'
| where t 


adsb
| where fields.r == '92-03327'

adsb
| extend r = tostring(fields.r)
| summarize countEntries=count() by r, timestamp
| where countEntries > 1

adsb
| where name ==  'readsb_aircraft'
| distinct tostring(fields.r), tostring(fields.nav_modes), timestamp
| order by timestamp

adsb
| where fields['desc'] == "AIRBUS A-321"
| where fields['calc_track'] <> ""
| where fields['r'] == "N342DN"
| where fields['messages'] == 19

adsb
| summarize max(timestamp)

.show database ADSB operations mirroring-statistics 

| extend r = tostring(fields.r)
| extend nav = tostring(fields.nav_modes)
| extend s = tostring(fields.seen)
| summarize countEntries=count() by r, s, nav, timestamp
| where countEntries > 1

adsb
| where name ==  'readsb_aircraft'
| where notempty(fields["gva"])
| take 100

adsb
| where name ==  'readsb_aircraft'
| where notempty(tags["emergency"])
| where tags["emergency"] != "none"


//Count of plane data points in last hour, aggregated by 5 minutes
adsb
| where ingestion_time() > now(-1h)
| summarize IngestionCount = count() by bin(ingestion_time(), 5m)

//callsign of top 10 airspeed of planes, last minute
adsb
| where ingestion_time() > now(-1m)
| where notempty(fields["alt_geom_geom"])
| where notempty(fields["gs"])
| where notempty(tags["r"])
| project alt_geomitude=toint(fields["alt_geom"]), Speed=toint(fields["gs"]), Callsign=tostring(tags["Call"]), CallsignURL=strcat("https://flightaware.com/live/flight/",tags["Call"])
| summarize arg_max(alt_geomitude, Speed, LastSeen=ingestion_time()) by Callsign, CallsignURL
| order by Speed
| limit 10 

//callsign of top alt_geomitude last minute in chart form
adsb
| where ingestion_time() > now(-1m)
| where notempty(fields["alt_geom"])
| where notempty(tags["Call"])
| project alt_geomitude=toint(fields["alt_geom"]), Speed=toint(fields["gs"]), Callsign=tostring(tags["Call"])
| summarize arg_max(alt_geomitude, Speed, LastSeen=ingestion_time()) by Callsign
| order by alt_geomitude
| limit 100 
| render scatterchart with (xcolumn=alt_geomitude, ycolumns=Speed, series=["Callsign"])

//Summary of top alt_geomitude aircraft in the last minute
adsb
| where ingestion_time() > now(-1m)
| where notempty(fields["alt_geom"])
| where notempty(fields["gs"])
| where notempty(tags["Call"])
| project alt_geomitude=toint(fields["alt_geom"]), Speed=toint(fields["gs"]), Latitude=todecimal(fields["Lat"]), Longitude=todecimal(fields["Long"]), Callsign=tostring(tags["Call"])
| summarize arg_max(alt_geomitude, Speed, Latitude, Longitude, LastSeen=ingestion_time()) by Callsign

adsb
| where tags["Call"] == "CALLSIGNHERE "
| project tags, ingestion_time()
tabs.title: Tab
